resources.string: In Accordance with the city of Orlando, we promise to adhere to all safety protocols in line with the guidelines laid out by the local government. If there is any breach of this contract, R3cycle is therefore held responsible along with any involved parties.

We encourage Orlando to become a more economically friendly environment. Due to the rise of industrialization and expansion, the lack of preserving nature, litter prevention, and ethical waste disposal is extremely harmful to both the environment and human health. This app aims to be a step in a long process for Orlando’s citizens and government to become proactive on these environmental issues.
General Info: It is imperative that everyone recycles, especially with the increased waste that causes landfills and pollutes the ocean.
Recycling materials can lower the amount of pollution, therefore preserving nature’s health and in turn the population’s health as well.
Locations: A good website to start is Earth 911 and any recycling centers near your area.
